page.title: 02THE FIRE STATION
page.content: In Stapleford there is a fire station. They have only one fire engine, because it is only a part time station. They practice every Monday night. The chief of the station is Sub. Officer Higton. The two leading fireman are leading fireman Cooper and leading fireman Gunn. They go to fires such as: shed fires, factory fires, car fires and any accidents. They carry two hose reels, twenty rolls of hose, ten sets of breathing apparatus, keys, bars and standpipes. On the top of the fire engine are two blue lights and horns, a fifty foot ladder and a twenty-five foot extension ladder. They wear a helmet, a tunic, trousers and boots.
